page.title: 14GIRLS PLAYGROUND GAMES.
page.content: Lesley and I have chosen 2 games that girls play in the playground. { { POISON FINGERS, MINIMUM 4 PLAYERS.} One person is"man"and the rest of the players hold her fingers.She calls a players name and that player has to evade the catcher.If caught the player puts her hands on the wall she can be freed by somebody,who has yet to be caught, running under her arms. { MAY WE CROSS YOUR GOLDEN RIVER. { MINIMUM 3 PLAYERS. } One person is"man"the others say "May we cross your golden river to fetch our father's Christmas dinner?"The person that is"man"chooses one aspect only to allow you to cross. e.g. those wearing red or those with hats on .If you have that attribute you try and get by the"man" but if they catch you,you are"man".
